rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BEH2032, BEH3011}

description: The unit establishes an extended scope of practice in the pre-hospital environment where the paramedic explores a range of diseases and conditions and deals with their consequences in out-of-hospital situations. The content of the unit and the practical application of skills will prepare the paramedic for a potential extended care role within a variety of settings in communities and workplaces, locally and internationally.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
